attributes.action: I want government and opposition to abolished the housing act 21 section
attributes.additional_details: because government or parliamentary commission can forced locals council to abolish section 21 of housing act
attributes.background: I want you please start discussion in the parliament and abolished this section and bring rent calculator to solved the dispute !Dubai government has this calculator

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610444
